channel.title: News on goserv - A lightweight toolkit for web applications in Go
channel.description: Recent content in News on goserv - A lightweight toolkit for web applications in Go

item.title: Release v1.0.0rc1
item.description:
The first release candidate is now available :). That means that the API documentation is also now available on GoDoc. Check it out and feel free to contact me (hello@goserv.it) if you have ideas for improvement.

Enjoy the rest of your weekend :)
